mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AEGISAI.PROCESSING_QUEUE (MSGID, TASK_TYPE, STATUS, `DATA`, ERROR_MESSAGE, RUN_AT, CREATE_DT) VALUES(#{msgId}, #{taskType}, 'PENDING', #{data}, NULL, current_timestamp(), current_timestamp())
mapper.select: SELECT MSGID AS msgId, TASK_TYPE AS taskType, STATUS AS status, DATA AS data, ERROR_MESSAGE as errorMessage, RUN_AT AS runAt, CREATE_DT as createDt FROM PROCESSING_QUEUE WHERE TASK_TYPE = #{taskType} AND STATUS = 'PENDING' ORDER BY MSGID LIMIT #{limit} FOR UPDATE SKIP LOCKED
mapper.update: UPDATE PROCESSING_QUEUE SET STATUS = 'PENDING' WHERE STATUS = 'RUNNING'
UPDATE PROCESSING_QUEUE SET STATUS = 'RUNNING', RUN_AT = NOW() WHERE MSGID= #{msgId}
UPDATE PROCESSING_QUEUE SET STATUS='DONE', ERROR_MESSAGE=NULL WHERE MSGID= #{msgId}
